definition: to resist Japan (esp. during WW2)/anti-Japanese (esp. wartime activities)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

pinyin: kang4 Ri4 jiu4 wang2 tuan2 ti3

definition: the Save the Nation Anti-Japanese Protest Movement stemming from the Manchurian railway incident of 18th July 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变
pinyin: Kang4 Ri4 Jiu4 wang2 Yun4 dong4

sentences.english: Fourth, Northeast anti-Japanese national united front is characterized by its universality.
sentences.chinese: 第四，东北抗日民族统一战线具有广泛性。

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War period, the County is the coexistence of two regimes.
sentences.chinese: 抗日战争时期，县境基本上是两种政权并存。

sentences.english: Now , I will tell you a story about the little hero Yulai .
sentences.chinese: 现在，我就给你们讲抗日小英雄雨来的故事。

sentences.english: At the critical moment, he plunged himself into the anti-Japanese war.
sentences.chinese: 在民族危机时刻他奋起投入了抗日救亡运动。

sentences.english: Large anti-Japanese protests erupted during the latest party meeting.
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗日游行在此次五中全会期间爆发。

sentences.english: In all our work we must persevere in the Anti-Japanese National United Front as the general policy.
sentences.chinese: 在一切工作中，应该坚持抗日民族统一战线的总方针。

sentences.english: The people should be persuaded to become accustomed to observing the decrees of the anti-Japanese democratic government.
sentences.chinese: 在人民中，要养成遵守抗日民主政权法令的习惯。

sentences.english: But resistance to Japan is not finished and done for, nor are all Kuomintang members scoundrels.
sentences.chinese: 但是抗日仍然是有希望的，国民党里面也不都是坏人。

sentences.english: KMT-CCP cooperation ensured the War against Japan .
sentences.chinese: 国共合作是抗日战争胜利的根本保证。

sentences.english: Chapter Three comes to study the electoral system in period of anti-Japan democratic regime.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是抗日民主政权时期的选举制度研究。

sentences.english: If the ice is not found in Jinghu but to join a real Anti Japanese team.
sentences.chinese: 若冰虽然没有找到高镜湖却加入一支真正的抗日队伍。

sentences.english: The picture shows team appealing for resistance against Japan on the streets of Mandalay.
sentences.chinese: 图为工作队高举队旗在曼德勒市街头宣传抗日。

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War early, Linfen in Shanxi Province for seven administrative districts in the 6th District.
sentences.chinese: 抗日战争初期，临汾为山西省7个行政区中的第6区。

sentences.english: Huang Gang is the rising reporter star during the War of Resistance against Japan.
sentences.chinese: 黄钢是中国抗日战争中升起的一颗记者新星。

sentences.english: It happened during the Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 事情发生在抗日战争的时候。

sentences.english: The Chinese Anti-Japanese war began the earliest and lasted the longest, and was the determinant in defeating Japanese Fascists.
sentences.chinese: 中国抗日战争是世界反法西斯战争的东方主战场。

definition: war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)
New Fourth army of Republic of China, set up in 1937 and controlled by the communists
Eighth Route Army, the larger of the two major Chinese communist forces fighting the Japanese in the Second Sino-Japanese War (1937-1945)
War of Liberation (1945-49), after which the Communists 共產黨武裝|共产党武装 under Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 took over from the Nationalists 國民政府|国民政府 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Japanese devil (common term of abuse in wartime China and in subsequent writing)
Resist US, help North Korea (1950s slogan)
Guomindang 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] and Chinese Communist Party 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
